root.name: Big Town Shootout
root.description: OverviewBig Town Shootout is a WiiWare game that features 4-player co-op and is packaged with the Wii Blaster. It was developed by PDP, or, Performance Designed Products.Features40 levels10 zones4-player Co-Op10 game typesLocationsTrain TroubleSaloonWindmillMineCardsRanchStreetBoothill CemeteryOutlaw CampWestern DesertReceptionIGN gave it a 6 out of 10, stating: "It's okay all around, but nothing you should spend five dollars to download by itself."
